title: Saved Search Folder Results in Dup Messages
content: I have a folder created from a saved search. It shows all unread messages across all my folders. It's by far the folder I use the most often. I often scroll through it and sort the messages into other folders. But when I move a message, I often end-up with 2 copies: one stays in the original folder and a second appears in the folder I moved the message to. (I'm not using COPY, just MOVE). Any idea what's going on or how to fix it?
creator: ThunderbirdUser23987

title: Can't receive email due to a "certificate" problem
content: I am receiving a notification that states "The certificate for mail.morrisbb.net is not valid for that server. Someone could be trying to impersonate the server ". As a result I am not receiving any emails through Thunderbird, but I can go to the Morris Broadband website to colllect them. I have used Thunderbird for many years without a problem. I don't understand what that notification means. I don't even know what a certificate is! So, in short, I don't have a clue how to fix this issue. Can someone please give me a clue as I'm clueless. Also, I turned off my antivirus program (Malwarebytes) and that didn't help at all. I appreciate your help!
creator: billybob716

creator: rpieces

title: Thunderbird mega sanfu
content:
Hello,

Windows 11 OS / PC

Basically I have Thunderbird installed on my second hard drive. I had several folders of different programs in that drive. I was basically trying to clean up those folders, so I made a folder called programs, and was dragging program files into that folder.

I dragged the whole Thunderbird folder into that new folder. That was where my issue started. After that, the desktop shortcut I had for it wouldn't work. Ok, easy, I went to the Thunderbird folder, found its .exe and voila, made new shortcut.

When I opened that up, it was basically like a new install, asking me to set up username/password pop/smtp etc. I'm decently ok at this, and I know that your Thunderbird profile can just be put in and it will pull everything back up the way it was, only, it's not.

When I looked in the AppData profile area for Thunderbird, it had a profile that was listed at 6:53, 7/22/2025 the exact time I moved the whole folder, and created the new shortcut...

So, my question is, how screwed am I? When I built my PC, I imported the Thunderbird profile over from the old computer to the new one. This was on 12/31/2023. So now, I see no other profiles but from 2023, and from the screwup date, today 7/22/2025.

I should also mention I tried messing with Thunderbird again later this evening, and it made another profile, 10:30 7/22/2025. I knew this wasn't right, and deleted it. So now, when I click on the Thunderbird shortcut, it says profile cannot load Thunderbird, profile is missing / inaccessible. So, Thunderbird won't even load up.

I'm wary of doing a fresh install, as I'm thinking there should be a profile dated between 12/31/2023 and today 7/22/2025, and I don't want a new install to wipe everything if the correct profile is hiding in there somewhere.

If I somehow figure out how to get the main program working again, please tell me the current data from Thunderbird before moving the folder is stored on that original 12/31/2023 profile. I really really really hope the correct and current profile wasn't wiped out when I moved the folder.

Is there a way to do a Windows restore to get it back if it is truly gone? If it is not truly gone, is it still the 12/31/2023 profile (Thunderbird just updates that original profile and keeps the original date that was transferred to the new computer)? If not, how can I find the current one I had before moving the folder? And how can I get Thunderbird to load using that profile?

Thank you for taking time to read this, and if you can help me get my Thunderbird back, you are a God among mortals!
creator: nutbustertwo

title: Request to Resolve Phone Number Not Showing on Google Maps – Nav Jyoti Foundation
content:
Dear Google Support Team,

I am writing to bring to your attention an issue with our business listing on Google Maps.

Business Name: Nav Jyoti Foundation Website: https://www.navjyotifoundationindia.com/ Problem: Our phone number is not appearing/live on our Google Maps business listing, which is affecting our ability to communicate with those seeking urgent support and rehabilitation services.

We have verified our listing, and all other details are visible except the contact number. We kindly request you to look into this matter and enable the phone number to be displayed properly on our listing.

Please let us know if any additional verification or action is required from our side to resolve this issue.

Thank you for your support and assistance.
creator: navjyotifoundationharyana

The point is this: - I receive the mail but the mail has a "send" button (maybe the receipt?). - If I click "send", the original mail VANISHES and I get a draft mail which has the addreses that the original senders used as "To", but no sign of the e-mail address of the sender!!! - The mail is flagged as "This is a draft message".

How I stop this insanity for good? Thanks and Kind Regards, Skarm

content:
Hi, I am working as a freelance translator and get notifications about work from different platforms. But a few days ago I noticed that I am not receiving them anymore.

If you have suggestion to what the cause of this could be, I would be very happy because this is causing me to loose jobs. The addresses that are affected is: notifications@lilt.com noreply@em.lilt.com notifications@fluently.s.xtrf.eu services@lilt.com I think also all that starts with notifications@ is affected.

Thank you in advance! And just to say; I think Thunderbird is fantastic; much better than Outlook :-)

title: Address book primer?
content:
My contacts are a hot mess. For fear of destruction, I have not done any housekeeping. I feel like in past, my elementary trial and error tests have yielded inconsistent results. (It could be my brain that yields inconsistent results.) e.g. Add or delete a test contact on either side, seems to end up confusing me more! I'd love to read about sync priorities or settings yet seems like all I can find is Q&A forums or a download for a printable PDF that is reputedly maybe out of date...

☺Is there a basic, extended primer on how address books and syncing work with TB?

My: "Personal Address Book" has 9K+ entries, yet the google contacts that seems to reside in "Address Book" has only 4K+, which matches my contacts on google site.

I want to begin the arduous process of deleting "duplicates", many of which seem to be not really identical, and I need to ascertain what is current...

But where to start? My fear is if I go to contacts.google.com and do a ton of culling, that at the next sync everything that I deleted will be restored by TB.

Another concern is android syncing to google but I suppose that's another forum. I use Bluemail currently...I just got used to it. I think I finally got past the issues with "phone storage" vs "Google storage" and then I finally realized that linking my phone to 2 separate google accounts wasn't helping.☺

Should I switch to Thunderbird Mobile? Does it sync nicely with android/google? Is every different phone going to behave differently?

TIA and forgive my ignorance.

title: أهم 10 لغات برمجة للمواقع الإلكترونية
content:
في ظل التحول الرقمي المتسارع في المملكة العربية السعودية، أصبح اختيار لغة البرمجة المناسبة أمرًا جوهريًا لبناء مواقع إلكترونية ناجحة وآمنة وسريعة. سواء كنت مطورًا سعوديًا أو صاحب مشروع ناشئ، فإن معرفةأهم 10 لغات برمجة للمواقع الإلكترونية أمر لا غنى عنه لتحقيق أهدافك التقنية.


ما هي لغات البرمجة؟ لغات البرمجة هي أدوات تُمكن المطورين من التواصل مع الأجهزة لإنشاء مواقع الويب، تطبيقات الهاتف، قواعد البيانات، وخدمات الذكاء الاصطناعي. تختلف هذه اللغات بين Front-End مثل JavaScript وHTML، وBack-End مثل PHP وPython.

لماذا تعتبر لغات البرمجة مهمة؟ اختيار اللغة المناسبة يحدد:

أداء الموقع وسرعته.

أمان البيانات.

قابلية التوسع والنمو.

تحسين تجربة المستخدم.

دعم محركات البحث (SEO).

أهم 10 لغات برمجة للمواقع الإلكترونية: HTML: الهيكل الأساسي لأي موقع ويب.

CSS: تصميم وتنسيق واجهات المستخدم.

JavaScript: التفاعل الديناميكي مع المستخدم، أساس الواجهة الأمامية.

PHP: تطوير الخوادم والمواقع الديناميكية (مثل WordPress).

Python: دعم الذكاء الاصطناعي وتطبيقات البيانات (Django، Flask).

Ruby: تطوير سريع عبر إطار Ruby on Rails.

Java: مثالية للمؤسسات الضخمة والمشاريع الحكومية.

TypeScript: نسخة متقدمة من JavaScript لتطوير مشاريع معقدة.

SQL: إدارة قواعد البيانات واسترجاع البيانات بفعالية.

Node.js: تشغيل JavaScript على الخادم لتطبيقات الوقت الحقيقي.

كيف يختار المطورون السعوديون اللغة البرمجية؟ JavaScript وPHP هما الأكثر طلبًا محليًا.

Python خيار مثالي لتقنيات الذكاء الاصطناعي وفقًا لرؤية 2030.

Ruby أو Node.js مناسبة للمشاريع الناشئة.

Java وC# تلائم تطبيقات المؤسسات الكبيرة.

ما هو الموقع الإلكتروني ولماذا تحتاجه شركتك؟ الموقع الإلكتروني هو واجهتك الرقمية على الإنترنت. من خلال استخدام أهم 10 لغات برمجة للمواقع الإلكترونية، يمكنك إنشاء موقع يقدم تجربة احترافية للمستخدم، يعزز من ثقة العملاء، ويساهم في زيادة المبيعات من خلال تحسين محركات البحث (SEO) والتحول الرقمي.

دور شركة مسار الرقمية في تطوير المواقع تعتمد شركة مسار الرقمية مسار الرقمية في السعودية على أقوى لغات البرمجة مثل JavaScript، Python، PHP، Java، TypeScript، SQL وRuby لبناء مواقع متكاملة تلائم طبيعة السوق السعودي وتحقق أهداف رؤية 2030. من خلال خبرتها الواسعة، تقدم حلولًا برمجية ذكية، آمنة، وسريعة.
creator: aeb86152

Here is a screenshot of how I used to have my inbox and I want to keep it that way now but I don't know how.

The first picture is how I had it setup before in 115 and I want to keep that format for 128. The second picture is what TB automatically changed my view to after the update. I didn't manually make any changes.

I have a userchrome.css setup already and it is making some changes but not everything I want anymore. How to I change the userchrome.css to revert the view? I want the colors and size and everything of the lighter color as well as the multi line view.

My userChrome.css is available to view here:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/x1ss94o727bzbptt64yot/userChrome.css?rlkey=zyywmb73r6pq9li7sah03sid5&e=1&st=cvu2yefz&dl=0

title: transfering Thunderbird content and settings from W10 to Linux Mint
content:
L.S. I installed Thunderbird version 128.12.Oesr on a Linux Mint (version 21.3 "Virginia") machine. Then I exported my Thunderbird (128.12.Oesr) content and settings from my W10 computer. Procedure: Thunderbird, help, troubleshooting information, opening profile folder, stepping three levels higher, then copy the folder "Thunderbird" to an external HD. In the receiving Linux computer I opened help, troubleshooting information, profile folder, three steps higher, I ended in home, where I had no permission to copy that Thunderbird folder residing on the external HD. I coppied it to /home/huib and changed the name from "Thunderbird" to ".thunderbird" (no capital; leading dot). Thunderbird keeps asking for an account setup.... Is there someone Who can (and will!) help me out? Thank You!

PS1.: two separate machines, both single boot. PS2.: the file was 5 GB; too large for the Thunderbird export tool. PS3.: I tried: sudo cp -r .thunderbird .. that indeed copied that directory .thunderbird into my root directory, where I now find, next to my directory "huib" a directory ".thunderbird" Still no success...

title: Comcast email stops working when VPN changes servers.
content:
Hello,

I recently started using Proton VPN for general security. It worked fine with Thunderbird for several months, but recently, Thunderbird has started dropping its connection to Comcast, rendering that email unusable. If I turn off the VPN and reboot without it (or through a US server), it will reconnect, but the moment it switches servers or tries to connect through another country, it kicks out Comcast and won't reconnect until I reboot the computer again.

Is there a fix for this? Preferably a way to sign in, and stay signed in, to email only without granting full access to my entire Comcast account?

Thank you!
creator: user398

title: Signature won't display above quoted Text

title: Invoking Thunderbird from mac "Dock" uses > 100% cpu with noisy fan,  invoking manually doesn't. Why?
content:
I use Thunderbird 140.1.0esr, in Catalina 10.15.7 on a 2012 mac mini. Before 140.0esr, everything worked nicely. Since it updated to 140.0esr (I think), invoking Catalina from the Dock became a CPU hog, using over 100% cpu, (there were 2 Activity Monitor entries: Thunderbird and thunderbird, adding up to > 100%) and causing intrusive fan-noise from the mini's fan.

I thought invoking TB from the Dock was little more than running, from a Terminal: 

/Applications/Thunderbird.app/Contents/MacOS/thunderbird &

However, I tried doing that (which I called "invoking TB manually" in the subject above. To my surprise, TB's CPU consumption dropped by about 90%, and the fan shut up. As far as I can see (at least, having sent test messages between various accounts), TB seems to look and work just fine when invoked manually.

My problem is that I'm baffled as to why "Dock" Thunderbird.app is so uncivilised compared to "manual" invocation of thunderbird.
creator: hancock1

title: Pastas/subpastas aparecem em cinza/itálico e não permitem mover ou salvar mensagens / Folders showing in grey/italic and won’t allow moving or saving messages
content:
Estou enfrentando um problema com a organização de pastas no meu cliente de e‑mail Mozilla Thunderbird e preciso de ajuda para restaurar o funcionamento normal.

Detalhes do ambiente

Versão do Thunderbird: 140.1.0esr 64-bit

Sistema operacional: Windows 11, version 24H2

Tipo de conta: IMAP

Descrição do problema

Tenho uma estrutura de pastas e subpastas onde arquivo os e‑mails por assunto.

De forma repentina, várias subpastas passaram a aparecer em cinza claro e em itálico.

Nessas pastas não consigo:

Salvar ou mover novos e‑mails para dentro delas;

Alterar o nome ou a posição na hierarquia;

Excluir ou recriar as pastas;

Restaurá‑las ao formato original.

Além disso, essas subpastas estavam originalmente em EDIFICIOS ➜ (diversas subpastas), mas agora aparecem dentro de TESSARI (que também era subpasta de EDIFICIOS).

O problema ocorre apenas nessas pastas; as demais permanecem normais.

Ações já tentadas

Reiniciar o Thunderbird e o computador;

Compactar pastas;

Reparar índices (clicar com o botão direito na pasta ➜ Propriedades ➜ “Reparar pasta”);

Desativar complementos;

Iniciar o Thunderbird em modo de segurança.

Até o momento, nenhuma dessas ações resolveu o problema.

Solicitação

Gostaria de orientação sobre como restaurar essas pastas ao estado normal (cor padrão, texto sem itálico) e devolvê‑las à posição correta dentro de EDIFICIOS.

Se for necessário acessar logs ou realizar procedimentos avançados, por favor, indiquem os passos.

Agradeço desde já pela atenção e fico no aguardo de instruções.

Atenciosamente, ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Dear Support Team,

I am experiencing an issue with my folder structure in Mozilla Thunderbird and need assistance restoring normal functionality.

Environment

Thunderbird version: 140.1.0esr 64-bit

Operating system: Windows 11, version 24H2

Account type: IMAP

Problem description

I maintain a set of folders and subfolders to organize my email.

Several subfolders suddenly began displaying in light grey and italic font.

Within these folders I cannot:

Save or move new messages into them;

Rename or reposition them in the hierarchy;

Delete or recreate them;

Restore them to their original appearance.

These subfolders were originally located under EDIFICIOS ➜ (various subfolders) but now appear under TESSARI, which itself used to be a subfolder of EDIFICIOS.

The issue affects only these specific folders; all others behave normally.

Steps already attempted

Restarting Thunderbird and the computer;

Compacting folders;

Repairing indexes (right‑click folder ➜ Properties ➜ “Repair Folder”);

Disabling add‑ons;

Launching Thunderbird in Safe Mode.

None of these actions resolved the problem.

Request

I would appreciate guidance on how to restore these folders to their normal state (standard color, non‑italic text) and move them back under EDIFICIOS.

If logs or advanced procedures are required, please provide the necessary steps.

Thank you for your attention. I look forward to your instructions.

Best regards,
creator: leo.somensi11

title: When Thunderbird is running my internet speed is 1/4 of normal
content:
Hi,

I am seeing an issue where if Thunderbird is running -- 140.1.0esr (32-bit), Windows 11 -- I see my internet connection speed reduced from over 900MBps to less than 300Mbps. Thunderbird doesn't show any activity in its status bar and Task Manager shows only extremely minimal CPU and Network load attributable to Thunderbird.

This is repeatable. Start Thunderbird, give it a few minutes, run Speedtest. Quit Thunderbird, re-run Speedtest. Try the same test with each of other programs that I generally level running. Repeat test with all such other programs running. And then just repeat again to confirm. Results are consistent. The download speeds is affected; upload is not.

And yes, I have run the test after Thunderbird had been running for hours with the same results.

Anybody have any ideas?

-Carl
